metadata.dc:author: Marco Algarra, J
Giménez Vaíllo, F
Carceller y del Campo Biosca, A
Franco, R
metadata.dc:description: The AA. expose the experience gained through a group of 9 cases of malignant external otitis. They review the previous circumstances, assess the results of medical and/or surgical treatment and the evolution of the processes, emphasizing the importance of prognostic factors. Twenty-two per cent was the rate mortality.
metadata.dc:title: Otitis externa maligna. Nuestra experiencia.
[Otitis externa maligna. Our experience].
